#! dgenerate 3.2.1


# Utilize the OpenPose ControlNet with an OpenPose rigging image
# that is generated by the built in OpenPose image processor action

stabilityai/stable-diffusion-xl-base-1.0 --model-type torch-sdxl
--variant fp16 --dtype float16
--vae AutoencoderKL;model=madebyollin/sdxl-vae-fp16-fix
--sdxl-refiner stabilityai/stable-diffusion-xl-refiner-1.0
--gen-seeds 2
--inference-steps 30
--guidance-scales 8
--output-path boxer
--output-size 1024
--vae-tiling
--vae-slicing
--prompts "A boxer throwing a punch in the ring"
--control-nets thibaud/controlnet-openpose-sdxl-1.0;scale=1.0
--image-seeds "../../media/man-fighting-pose.jpg"
--control-image-processors "openpose;include-hand=true;include-face=true;output-file=boxer/boxer-openpose.png"
